entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming southwest 20. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
